basics.name: Amos Elmaliah
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack, Web3 (Solidity/Node/React), native mobile dev since 2008. Currently learning ZK Proofs
basics.headline: Building decentralized internet for everyone

work.name: DaoStack
work.summary: Dev lead of an On-chain fundraising platform allow DAOs (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) to coordinate and crowd fund special project that require more accessibility to broader wider audience.
highlights: Lead Development of fundraising Dapp http://commongood.it
Contribute and define to the web3 frontend architecture
Develop Solidity contracts to include milestone logic for fundraising
Develop subgraph code to expose contract history and database to the front end
Re-architecture of a firebase database for https://common.io

work.name: Cedar software Inc
work.summary: Owner and Chief of Contract work
highlights: Consulting, training and development of fullstack applications for agencies and startups
Involved in more than half a dozen major iOS apps such as Beme Inc, NYFW, a private aviation company, The Orchard

work.name: Starbyt
highlights: Managed multiple native mobile and web projects for clients in Israel and in the US.
Built and lead an agile offshore development team of 7 developers using React, React-Native and Node.JS
Conducted research in music and DSP algorithms, computer vision, and machine learning.
work.summary: Managed and Lead technology for multiple agency projects

work.name: MediaBrix/Receptiv
work.summary: Paved the transaction from Adobe Flash Rich Media advertizing to Hybrid Mobile with new customer apps such as Beach Buggy Racing
highlights: Contribute and redesign a mobile SDK with javascript bridge running business logic (years before react native)
Oversee and contribute to native iOS (Objective C) and Android (Java) and Unity and Phone Gap Plugins
Extend API to expose MRAID (Mobile Rich Media Ad Interface Definitions).
Extend API with other Ad Networks such as Flurry and Burstly

work.name: Rewind Me Inc
highlights: Prototyped and build multi threaded high throughput i/o background download manger
Optimized iOS CoreData hydration, transaction chunk size and faulting.
Creating thread safe hot cache for partial object representations
work.summary: Build iOS app that provides a way for users to store and own their social data

work.name: Oddcast
work.summary: Prototyped, developed and shipped mobile Apps

work.name: iFog
highlights: iPhone Developer of app
more than 250K downloads in less than 3 months
Reached 10 most downloaded apps
work.summary: Shipped quickly an entertainment mobile apps that ustilized the first iPhone SDK

work.name: UIMUI
highlights: Managed, developed and shipped mobile apps
Serve as consultant on user experience and developing mobile products.
Mentor at Bezelel Academy of Art and Design Jerusalem.
Mentor at the IDC Media Innovation Lab.

work.name: I AM RANDOM
highlights: Developed max/msp systems that synchronized and sequence sound synthesizers
Developed experimental sound instruments using granular synthesis, FM synthesis
Developed experimental video jockey tools for live video events

work.name: I AM RANDOM
work.summary: Edited and post produced documentary films, commercials and corporate internal communication videos for Dutch and Israeli Companies.

work.name: A.Elmaliah
work.summary: Edited and post produced documentary, commercial and corporate internal communication videos.

work.name: DCTV
work.summary: Gave workshops in Final Cut, Motion, Color, Soundtrack, After Effect.

volunteer.summary: Support elder and senior citizens wellbeing
Support elder and senior citizens wellbeing

education.institution: Hogeschool van Beeldende Kunsten, Muziek en Dans

references.name: Gilad Haimov
references.reference: had the privilege of working with Amos on developing a complex crypto-investments blockchain project. Amos has an exceptional technological skills, and his ability to learn on the job, navigate new knowledge domains, as well as lead and manage were felt and appreciated by all. He is smart, proactive, result oriented and responsible and a great asset to any company.

references.name: Ric Neil
references.reference: Amos and I worked together at Mediabrix. He created the SDK that I had game teams integrate. There are many types of engineers that can do this work, but Amos is the best, because his work is like art. His attention to detail and determination to make things perfect only made my job easier. He is one of the rare engineers that I have worked with that works with you in the trenches to deliver the right thing at the right time, right now. Not only that but he is also a great dinner companion and has such a passion for life and friendship it makes you glad to be on the planet with him.

references.name: Hila Dar
references.reference: Amos is sharp, dedicated, professional and great with getting things done. My students find his ideas fresh and inspiring, admire his knowledge and experience and produce great value from his simple and practical solutions. Although having no formal Computer Engineering education, his teaching defiantly show his hard gained garage crafts.
